name: umbrellajs
description: Lightweight javascript library for DOM manipulation and events
author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)

scripts.installphantom: npm run phantomlib && npm run phantominst && npm run phantommove
scripts.phantomlib: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install build-essential chrpath libssl-dev libxft-dev libfreetype6 libfreetype6-dev libfontconfig1 libfontconfig1-dev
scripts.phantominst: cd ~ && export PHANTOM_JS="phantomjs-1.9.7-linux-x86_64" && wget https://bitbucket.org/ariya/phantomjs/downloads/$PHANTOM_JS.tar.bz2 && sudo tar xvjf $PHANTOM_JS.tar.bz2
